languages.text: {n}Вы вспоминаете видение прошлого, о котором вам поведала Идира — по ее словам, любимым вином Теодоры было "Пламя чистоты".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы вспоминаете видение прошлого, о котором вам поведала Идира — по ее словам, любимым вином Теодоры было "Пламя чистоты".{/n}

languages.text: {n}You recall the vision of the past that Idira told you about — she said Theodora's favourite wine was Flame of Purity.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы вспоминаете видение прошлого, о котором вам поведала Идира — по ее словам, любимым вином Теодоры было "Пламя чистоты".{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous souvenez de la vision du passé dont Idira vous avait parlé, disant que le vin préféré de Théodora était la Flamme de pureté.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recall the vision of the past that Idira told you about — she said Theodora's favourite wine was Flame of Purity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous souvenez de la vision du passé dont Idira vous avait parlé, disant que le vin préféré de Théodora était la Flamme de pureté.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你回忆起之前伊迪拉告诉你的事情。她说，西奥多拉最喜欢的酒就是‘纯净之火’。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recall the vision of the past that Idira told you about — she said Theodora's favourite wine was Flame of Purity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你回忆起之前伊迪拉告诉你的事情。她说，西奥多拉最喜欢的酒就是‘纯净之火’。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du erinnerst dich an die Vision der Vergangenheit, von der Idira dir berichtet hat. Sie hat gesagt, dass Theodoras Lieblingswein Flamme der Reinheit war.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recall the vision of the past that Idira told you about — she said Theodora's favourite wine was Flame of Purity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du erinnerst dich an die Vision der Vergangenheit, von der Idira dir berichtet hat. Sie hat gesagt, dass Theodoras Lieblingswein Flamme der Reinheit war.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Recuerdas la visión del pasado de la que te habló Idira: dijo que el vino favorito de Theodora era Llama de la Pureza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recall the vision of the past that Idira told you about — she said Theodora's favourite wine was Flame of Purity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Recuerdas la visión del pasado de la que te habló Idira: dijo que el vino favorito de Theodora era Llama de la Pureza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}イディラが話してくれた過去のビジョンが頭に浮かぶ。シオドーラがお気に入りだったワインは「ピュリティの炎」だと言っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recall the vision of the past that Idira told you about — she said Theodora's favourite wine was Flame of Purity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラが話してくれた過去のビジョンが頭に浮かぶ。シオドーラがお気に入りだったワインは「ピュリティの炎」だと言っていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Geçmişe dair İdira'nın anlattığı bir görüyü hatırlıyorsun. Theodora'nın en sevdiği şarabın Saflık Alevi olduğunu söylemişti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recall the vision of the past that Idira told you about — she said Theodora's favourite wine was Flame of Purity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Geçmişe dair İdira'nın anlattığı bir görüyü hatırlıyorsun, Theodora'nın en sevdiği şarabın Saflık Alevi olduğunu söylemişti.{/n}
